document.full_text: asian share markets tumbled on thursday after a second big sell-off in commodities in less than a week curbed investor appetite for riskier investments and boosted the u.s. dollar, while a short-lived recovery in oil prices was wiped out in late trade.
document.title: asia stocks fall sharply on weaker commodities
lines_and_colors: asian share markets tumbled on thursday after a second big sell-off in commodities in less than a week curbed investor appetite for riskier investments and boosted the u.s. dollar, while a short-lived recovery in oil prices was wiped out in late trade.
